name: Not Alone (Helix Games)
description:
NOW ONLY $0.49!No one talks to you.
All the other humans are assholes that want to shoot you.
The only things you can find are lasers, pools of acid, and the kickass soundtrack by Kubbi.
You are alone.

Except for your cube.
You are not alone.

Not Alone is a puzzle platformer where you and your cube must make your way through the facility, solving the puzzles and defeating the asshats that try to stop you.

With an awesome soundtrack by Kubbi, difficult and challenging levels, and with more content on the way, why not pick it up today?
